install.name: Social Media Links
install.author: Viper Web Solutions
install.copyright: Copyright (c) 2008-2010 Viper Web Solutions. Icons provided by http://jwloh.deviantart.com/ - jwloh01@gmail.com
install.description:
Social Media Icon Links Extension (S.M.I.L.E.) v1.6

This module displays Web 2.0 style icons that link to your social media profiles. To get started go to the module parameters and choose the icon size you want, then add the URLs of your social media profiles. Any icon/URL fields left empty simply won't be displayed. Be sure to include http:// in all URLs. For support contact us at support@viperwebsites.com

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: theme
param.label: Choose Theme
param.description: This module supports multiple icon themes. You can download additional icon theme packs at www.viperwebsites.com

param.name: size
param.label: Choose Icon Size
param.description: Choose the size of your icons. 1 = smallest & 5 = Largest

param.name: align
param.label: Align Icons
param.description: Choose to align the icons to the left or to the right. Only use center if you are using one icon

param.name: margin
param.label: Space Between Icons
param.description: Add the space in px to display between the icons

param.name: text
param.label: Hover Text
param.description: Text to display when you mouseover the icon. ex: 'Follow us on' (The icon name will be apended to the end of this text to display ex: 'Follow us on Twitter'

param.name: rsstext
param.label: Hover Text for RSS Icon
param.description: If you are using the RSS Icon, add the text to display when you mouseover the icon. ex: 'Subscribe to our Feed' (This module does not generate a feed, it only provides an RSS icon to link to your feed)

param.name: target
param.label: Target
param.description: Choose to open the link in a new browser window or the same window

param.name: robots
param.label: Include the rel='nofollow' link attribute
param.description: Search Engines that support the rel='nofollow' attribute exclude these links from their ranking calculation

param.name: credits
param.label: Show a friendly link?
param.description: This option allows you to show/hide a link back to our website.
